headline: U.S. Officials  Find Remains  At Crash Site In Afghanistan
abstract: Military officials said that they had recovered two sets of remains from the two-person plane, and that the crash did not appear to be caused by enemy fire.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” Two sets of remains have been recovered at the site where an American military plane crashed in Taliban-controlled territory outside Kabul, Afghanistan, on Monday, American military officials said, after a day in which United States forces struggled to get to the site.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
